title: Compare data set statistics given histograms

content.question: Which of the following statements must be true about the data sets A and B displayed in the histograms above?

choices.label: The mean of data set A is equal to the mean of data set B.
The median of data set A is equal to the median of data set B.
The range of data set A is equal to the range of data set B.
The standard deviation of data set A is less than the standard deviation of data set B.
The standard deviation of data set A is greater than the standard deviation of data set B.

content.answer: The standard deviation of data set A is greater than the standard deviation of data set B.

topic.text: 1.7: Summary Statistics for a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Compare distributions or relative positions of points within a distribution.
